title: Make error associated with naming of SAM and BAM files clearer to show users exactly how they should be named
Double normalization
body: Put double normalized peaks and wiggle files into a single folder outside of the individual normalizations

title: Double normalization
body: Make it possible to start with FASTQ files for double normalization pipeline

title: Put pipeline v3 library files in dedicated folder
body: Name the folder after the Bowtie version.

title: ChIPseq_closing doesn't run if other jobs are stuck in the queue due to prior files failing.
Viji's suggestions related to error/output files
body:
Save final file as: $CHIP_$JOBID.out

Incorporate delimiters to make easier to read long outputs.

Send e-mail after job is complete.

title: Incorporate $TAGC into output name
body:
If $TAGC exists (or was defined within pipeline), use this name.
Otherwise use $CHIP.

title: When $CHIP includes *
body:
When $CHIP includes *, it is treated differently in different locations in the pipeline.
MACS2_pipeline_$CHIP.txt also includes * in original file, but not in ChIPseq_closing.sbatch

title: Naming error file when running replicates
body: Use REP to name error file.
